0.text: Innate: Each of Syndra's abilities gain an additional effect at maximum rank.
0.html: Innate: Each of Syndra's abilities gain an additional effect at maximum rank.

0.text: Active: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere at the target location that appears after a 0.6-second delay, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies. The Dark Sphere then remains on the ground for 6 seconds.
0.html: Active: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere at the target location that appears after a 0.6-second delay, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies. The Dark Sphere then remains on the ground for 6 seconds.

1.text: Transcendent Bonus: Dark Sphere deals 25% bonus damage against  champions.
1.html: Transcendent Bonus: Dark Sphere deals 25% bonus damage against champions.
markedPassages: Transcendent
champions

2.text: Dark Sphere will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Dark Sphere will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Syndra grabs the nearest  Dark Sphere, enemy  minion or non-epic  monster within 400 range from the target location, and holds it for 5 seconds. If a Dark Sphere is grabbed, its duration is refreshed; if a minion or monster is grabbed, it is put in  stasis. If no valid target can be found at the target location, Syndra will grab the nearest  Dark Sphere.
0.html: Active: Syndra grabs the nearest Dark Sphere, enemy minion or non-epic monster within 400 range from the target location, and holds it for 5 seconds. If a Dark Sphere is grabbed, its duration is refreshed; if a minion or monster is grabbed, it is put in stasis. If no valid target can be found at the target location, Syndra will grab the nearest Dark Sphere.
markedPassages: Dark Sphere
minion
monster
stasis
Dark Sphere

1.text: Force of Will can be recast while the target is being held.
1.html: Force of Will can be recast while the target is being held.

2.text: Recast: Syndra throws the grabbed target towards the target location, granting  sight of their surroundings as they fall and dealing magic damage to them and nearby enemies,  slowing all of them for 1.5 seconds.
2.html: Recast: Syndra throws the grabbed target towards the target location, granting sight of their surroundings as they fall and dealing magic damage to them and nearby enemies, slowing all of them for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: sight
slowing

3.text: Transcendent Bonus: Force of Will deals「  20% bonus true damage. 」「 46 (+ 14% AP) bonus true damage. 」
3.html: Transcendent Bonus: Force of Will deals「  20% bonus true damage. 」「 46 (+ 14% AP) bonus true damage. 」
markedPassages: Transcendent
「  20% bonus true damage. 」「 46 (+ 14% AP) bonus true damage. 」
20% bonus true damage
「 46 (+ 14% AP) bonus true damage. 」

0.text: Active: Syndra propels a wave of force in a cone in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and  knocks them back for 400 units and up to 800 units away from Syndra based on proximity, though not through terrain.
0.html: Active: Syndra propels a wave of force in a cone in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and knocks them back for 400 units and up to 800 units away from Syndra based on proximity, though not through terrain.
markedPassages: knocks them back

1.text: Dark Spheres can be knocked back for 1000 units and up to 1300 units away from Syndra based on proximity,  knocking back enemies they hit over 100 units, though not through terrain. This also  stuns and  reveals them for 1.5 seconds, and deals Scatter the Weak's damage if they were not damaged by the initial cast.
1.html: Dark Spheres can be knocked back for 1000 units and up to 1300 units away from Syndra based on proximity, knocking back enemies they hit over 100 units, though not through terrain. This also stuns and reveals them for 1.5 seconds, and deals Scatter the Weak's damage if they were not damaged by the initial cast.

knocking back
stuns
reveals

2.text: Transcendent Bonus: Scatter the Weak's area of effect is 50% wider.
2.html: Transcendent Bonus: Scatter the Weak's area of effect is 50% wider.

0.text: Active: Syndra enters a 0.264 seconds cast time, creating  3 Dark Spheres and grabbing up to 4 nearby Dark Spheres that were last spawned. Afterwards, the collected Dark Spheres are hurled in a volley at the target enemy champion, each dealing magic damage upon hit.
0.html: Active: Syndra enters a 0.264 seconds cast time, creating 3 Dark Spheres and grabbing up to 4 nearby Dark Spheres that were last spawned. Afterwards, the collected Dark Spheres are hurled in a volley at the target enemy champion, each dealing magic damage upon hit.
markedPassages: 3 Dark Spheres

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Drain: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you cannot gain mana, heal for 「 45% of this value 」「 0.675 」instead.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 ability power
+20 ability haste
+600 mana
+6 magic penetration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Echo: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within 600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ECHO: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within  600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
